content: malabrigo waffles scarf size approximately 7 5 wide and 65 long length is adjustable to your desired size yarn malabrigo merino worsted o r a worsted weight yarn of your choice approx 315yds 288m amount will vary based on desired length needles size us8 5 0mm or a size to obtain a fabric you like with your yarn gauge 18 sts over 4 not very important as long as you like the fabric made with your yarn and needle choice stitches and abbreviations k - knit p - purl instructions cast on 30 stitches row 1 knit across row 2 purl across row 3 k2 p2 across end k2 row 4 p2 k2 across end p2 repeat until scarf is desired length and bind off blocking a light steam blocking will help to remove some of the curl from the edges of the scarf lay the scarf out on a heat and moisture resistance surface and flatten as much as possible by hand if you like pin the edges out flat pass an iron slowly over the surface steaming as you go be careful not to pull it so tight that you lose the waffle texture aallow the scarf to dry and cool before moving while it is impossible to completely prevent curling this helps tame the curl to a manageable level while wearing malabrigo waffles scarf | sarah florent | 2008
